reviewText: Series is well done and beautiful photographed.  Well worth the time to watch.  Highly recommended to anyone seeking to follow Christ.

I love these videos. While they're not "mainstream famous," they are deeply moving.  Bryn Yemm, a fabulous Welsh singer, gives us some of our favorite songs from the sites that probably inspired them.  I especially love hearing him sing "In the Garden" from the Garden of Gethsemene.
